entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @MSNBC We all need to commit to turning off msm network news channels for the day when they put anyone besides a medical expert on to talk about coronavirus. These jackasses in the White House have bungled this entire thing and don’t deserve a platform any longer on this subject,
